# cook your dish here
n,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
for i in range(k):
    if(n%10==0): n=n/10
    else: n=n-1
print(int(n))

# cook your dish here
n,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
nn=str(n)
while(k):
    if(nn[-1]!='0'):
        n-=1
        nn=str(n)
    else:
        n=n//10
        nn=str(n)
    k-=1
print(n)

# cook your dish here
n, k = input().split()
n = list(n)[::-1]
k = int(k)

for idx,i in enumerate(n):
    # print(n,i,k)
    
    if k > 0:
        i = int(i)

        if i>0 and i >= k:
            n[idx] = str(int(n[idx])-(k))
            k = 0
            i = int(n[idx])
            break

        elif k >= i+1:
            n[idx] = str(0)
            k -= (i + 1)
            if k == 0:
                idx += 1
                break

    if k==0:
        break
    
    
    # print(n,i,k)

print(int(''.join(n[idx:][::-1])))

# cook your dish here
l=list(map(int,input().strip().split()))
n=l[0]
k=l[1]
i=0
while i<k:
    if n%10==0:
        n=n//10
    else:
        n-=1
    i+=1
print(n)
